name: Plants vs. Zombies 2: Alternate UniverZ
summary: Plants vs. Zombies 2: Alternate UniverZ is a PvZ2 mod that aims to revamp PvZ2 vanilla with nostalgic changes such as PvZ1 progression and the return of 25 sun meta, along with extra content and mechanics. Its difficulty is targeted towards more casual players and slowly accelerates as the game progresses, but there is extra content for experienced players as well!
